adults.title: Self-actualization
adults.subtitle: For Adults
adults.description: Learn everything about your body in order to design the most effective lifestyle, diet, exercise, and health care plan for yourself.

nutrition.subtitle: Nutrition
nutrition.title: Customize Your Nutrition Plan
nutrition.description: Good nutrition lays the groundwork for a healthy life. Be informed about how your body reacts to specific nutrients in order to help fine-tune your eating habits and improve your health.

fitness.subtitle: Fitness
fitness.title: Optimize Your Fitness Plan
fitness.description: Exercise smarter, not harder. Knowing your genetic makeup helps design the ideal workout plan that works for you.

health.subtitle: Health
health.title: Assess the Risk of Hereditary Disease
health.description: Genetic mutations can be problematic. They can produce unwanted medical conditions that cause dangerous diseases. Knowing how your genes affect your health will help to tailor a proactive healthcare plan.

behavior.subtitle: Behavior
behavior.title: Explore Your Potential
behavior.description: Understand yourself better. Instead of wasting years of your life on fruitless efforts, discover your strengths and weaknesses and what works and what doesn't.

others.subtitle: Others
others.title: Improve Life via Minor Adjustments
others.description: Additional factors about your body are no less important. An awareness of these factors can give you an advantage, allowing you to apply small but critical changes that can improve your quality of life.

2.title: G-Pro
2.subtitle: Everything about your body

kids.title: Child Development
kids.subtitle: For Children
kids.description: Unlock your child's full potential. Optimize their education, nutrition, physical training, and health care.

intelligence.subtitle: Intelligence
intelligence.title: Discover Your Child's Potential and Talents
intelligence.description: Many people grow up never knowing their true talents, as talents can be elusive. Knowledge of your child’s genetic makeup will help to accurately pin-point their potential and aptitudes. This can give your child a head start in developing their talents to the fullest.

nutrition.subtitle: Nutrition
nutrition.title: Optimize Your Child’s Nutritional Plan
nutrition.description: Genetics play a key role in determining a child’s overall development, especially during early childhood. Getting to know your child’s genetic background can help you create a personalized diet plan that’s perfect for them.

behavior.subtitle: Behavior
behavior.title: Understand Your Child’s Behavioral Tendencies
behavior.description: Your child’s temperament is determined by a combination of hereditary and environmental factors. Help your child thrive by harmonizing your parenting style with who your child is, and is supposed to be.

health.subtitle: Health
health.title: Assess Your Child’s Health Risks
health.description: Be aware of your child’s risk of metabolic disorders and dangerous cancers in order to make informed decisions and take preventative actions.

2.title: G-Kid Pro

health.title: Health & Wellness
health.subtitle: For Healthcare
health.description: Assess the risk of hereditary diseases hidden in your genetic code, including 20 common types of cancer.

1.title: Simple, Safe, and Non-Invasive
1.description: Only your saliva is required. Our advanced technology allows us to extract DNA from saliva. This makes it simpler, safer, and more convenient to run genetic analyses as compared to conventional procedures that rely on blood samples.

2.title: Know Your Risks
2.description: Some cancers run in families and you may be at risk of cancer if your relatives have one form of it or another. Knowledge of your own genetic makeup helps you accurately assess your risk of cancer and create a better healthcare plan.

3.title: Customize Your Cancer Screening Plan
3.description: Unnecessary cancer screening carries its own risks, including physical distress, bleeding, and even cancer itself. In some cases, especially when symptoms are absent, general cancer screening might not dig deep enough to detect the presence of cancer. By understanding your genetic makeup, you can build a targeted screening plan to accurately detect cancer, reduce side effects, and save on costs.

autism.title: G-Autism
autism.subtitle: G-Autism
autism.description: Gain access to in-depth knowledge about gene-related causes of autism to make informed medical and lifestyle decision for your child.

1.title: Simple, Safe, and Non-Invasive
1.description: Only your saliva is required. Our advanced technology allows us to extract DNA from saliva. This makes it simpler, safer, and more convenient to run genetic analyses as compared to conventional procedures that rely on blood samples.

2.title: Know your child’s risk of autism
2.description: To date, hundreds of genes have been linked to Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD) via genetic studies on over 10,000 ASD patients and their families. Based on these studies, G-Autism decodes over 1200 genetic variants associated with ASD to calculate your child's risk score.

3.title: Provide the right care for your child
3.description: The G-Autism report provides recommendations for your child based on the analyzed result and the current guidelines from prominent organizations like NIH and American Academy of Pediatrics.

immunity.title: G-Immunity
immunity.subtitle: G-Immunity
immunity.description: Learn about your susceptibility to viral infection, with focus on respiratory diseases.

1.title: Simple, Safe, and Non-Invasive
1.description: Only your saliva is required. Our advanced technology allows us to extract DNA from saliva. This makes it simpler, safer, and more convenient to run genetic analyses as compared to conventional procedures that rely on blood samples.

2.title: Know your risk of viral infection
2.description: Using the latest advances in artificial intelligence and our state of the art—proprietary—technology, we will calculate your polygenic risk score for viral infections by collecting the weighted risk from over 85 genetic variations.

3.title: Stay safe by staying up to date
3.description: The G-Immunity report will provide you with the most up-to-date knowledge regarding viral infection risk and how to protect yourself, your family and even your pets against it.

awareness.title: G-Awareness
awareness.subtitle: Self Awareness
awareness.description: We analyzed 200 genes associated with your inborn personality:

1.title: In-depth knowledge about your inborn personality
1.description: With gene testing result, you can unveil your hidden information that you have never known, focus on strength to bring out great achievements.

2.title: In-depth knowledge about your mental health's problems associated with your genetic makeup
2.description: You can indentify different health risks (if any) by gene analysis, allow you to alter your lifestyle, habits to protect yourself.

3.title: Personalized recommendations to leverage your inborn strength and develop yourself
3.description: With genetic testing result and recommendations of genetic experts, you can design a bespoke plan to to enhance your physical and mental growth.

smart.title: G-Smart
smart.subtitle: Explore Your Ability
smart.description: We analyzed 201 genes associated with your inborn intellectual abilities.

1.title: In-depth knowledge about your inborn intellectual abilities
1.description: Your body’s genome is unique, differentiating your personality and ability from everyone else. If discovered, nurtured and practiced properly, you can maximize your inborn intellectual abilities.

2.title: In-depth knowledge about your strength of thinking capability
2.description: Once you understand your strengths, you can easily make important decisions for the future.

3.title: In-depth knowledge about your improvement areas of thinking capability (if any)
3.description: Genetic result can help you understand your abilities scientifically and accurately, thus, you can improve to develop perfectly.

4.title: Personalized recommendations to leverage your inborn strength and develop yourself
4.description: Our genetic result and recommendations from our experts can help you to adjust plan (if any) or personalize the diet/ sport/training one that perfect with you.

bestSellingDescriptionList.1: Explore your potential, strengths and weaknesses
bestSellingDescriptionList.2: Plan your future, accelerate your career

1.title: The Stroke report will provide the following information:
1.description:
• Pathogenic or likely pathogenic mutations that increase risk of strokes (ischemic stroke, hemorrhagic stroke).
  • Stroke Risk Score: a polygenic score that indicates the patient's increased risk of Stroke.
  • Provide in-depth knowledge about gene-related causes of stroke.
  • Information to help make informed medical and lifestyle decisions in regard to the user's risk of stroke, as well as available prevention and monitoring options.
  • Helpful and personalized recommendations.

2.title: Simple, Safe, and Non-Invasive
2.description: Only your saliva is required. Our advanced technology allows us to extract DNA from saliva. This makes it simpler, safer, and more convenient to run genetic analyses as compared to conventional procedures that rely on blood samples.

1.title: Allergy Screening
1.description: Identify allergens (from food such as cow milk, eggs, fish/shellfish, nuts, gluten, soy, wheat; or other allergens like insects, pets, pollen, dust, mold), contribute to effective treatments and eliminate the causes.

2.title: Simple, Safe, and Non-Invasive
2.description: Only your saliva is required. Our advanced technology allows us to extract DNA from saliva. This makes it simpler, safer, and more convenient to run genetic analyses as compared to conventional procedures that rely on blood samples.
